Question: TPK Universal Solutions Limited, Taiwan Branch CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
TPK Universal Solutions Limited, Taiwan Branch

Product: Contract Manufacturing Services

- Specializes in delivering high-quality and innovative touch products and technologies
- Provides end-to-end manufacturing services covering research, development, production, and quality control
- Adheres to international standards and quality management systems
- Offers comprehensive technical support, including post-sales support
- Committed to delivering high-quality and reliable products
- Possesses leading global technology, extensive experience, and exceptional quality
Summary_cn:
台北康科萬能解決方案有限公司，台灣分公司

產品：合同製造服務

- 專注於提供高品質和創新的觸控產品和技術
- 提供全程製造服務，包括研發、生產和品質控制
- 遵守國際標準和品質管理系統
- 提供全面的技術支援，包括售後支援
- 致力於提供高品質和可靠的產品
- 擁有領先的全球技術、豐富的經驗和卓越的品質
